resources.string: Am înțeles și vreaus să continui
Dezactivat pt ca secundele să nu fie afișate
Mișcarea ceasului pe ecran (ca un screen-saver)
Dacă ai ecran AMOLED, nu dezactiva
Setează timpul de start si sfîrșit ale profilului de noapte
Activează pentru ca alarma să aibș sunet progresiv.
Dacă e dezactvat, se urmărește poziția telefonului.
Auto (luminozitatea este setată de telefon în funcție de senzor.)
Pentru a putea folosi alarmele, trebuie să permiteți aplicației să seteze alarme si mementouri. Puteți face asta și mai târziu, sau revoca permisiunea oricând.
Swipe pentru a schimba dimensiunea cifrelor. Sunt două alarme, fiecare poate fi recurentă. Puteți folosi profilul de noapte să pornească automat la un momentdat.

Having an image on the screen for a long time might damage your AMOLED screen. The text moves by default (like a screen saver) every 5 minutes. You can disable the movement, but if you have an AMOLED screen you are highly discouraged to do so.
No radios matching the criteria! Please try again.
"Something went wrong while retrieving list. Please try again later. (error %d) "
Activați pentru a afișa nivelul bateriei(posibil să nu funcționeze pe toate telefoanele.)
Dacă e dezactivat, nivelul bateriei va fi afișat cu verde. (Cînd nivelul este scăzut, acesta va fi afișat cu roșu.) Posibil să trebuiască restart.
La ceasul 12h, afișează : între ora, min si sec
În modul portret, afișează ora, min, sec, unele sub altele.

Lista cu radiouri este redată de pe internet. Este mentinută de o comunitate de entuziaști și e posibil să nu fie 100% corectă. Sunt peste 15000 de radiouri, deci din această cauză este necesar să căutați cel puțin pe baza țării. Dacă doriîi să salvați un radio pe unul din butoane, dați click pe butonul corespunzător.

" - you can setup up to two alarms; they can be recurring by choosing the days - after alarm starts, clicking on the screen will stop the alarm, but radio continues playing at the current volume; use the volume buttons to set desired volume - after alarm starts - click the alarm cancel button (x) to cancel the alarm and stop playing the radio - you can also snooze the alarm; you can define your own snooze time (default is 10 minutes) - enable progressive alarm sound from settings menu "

"

Simple Radio Clock

This simple app just displays the clock in full screen mode and has 5 buttons associated each with a radio stream.

Out of the box it comes configured with Radio Guerrilla, Tananana and RockFM from Romania, RadioBOB from Germany and Zodiac from Ireland. These can be changed and you can have up to 8 buttons.

Reverse
Change screen orientation. Depending on the placement of the volume buttons, this might come in handy.

Settings
in this section you can set some neat stuff:

  • clock font: you can choose from many fonts for the clock display.
  • clock color
  • screen brightness (overrides the phone\'s settings)
  • clock size
  • enable/disable the display of seconds
  • enable 12 hour clock with or without the display of am/pm
  • enable/disable the movement of the clock on the screen; by default the clock moves around the screen corners - important if you have an AMOLED display (leaving an image on an AMOLED screen for a prolonged period of time might damage the screen)
  • custom sleep timer: the app features a sleep button that cycles through some predefined sleep timers (15, 20, 30 minutes); you can add your preferred one here -> You can activate the sleep timer from the sleep button on the main screen.
  • custom snooze time: you can set your own snooze timer (by default it is set to 10 minutes)
  • reverse stream/alarm buttons: put radio buttons at the top and the alarm buttons on the bottom. This might be helpful for certain phone holders.
  • unlock landscape mode so the clock will follow phone orientation; also ability to draw the clock vertically (with hours, minutes and/or seconds one below the other).
  • you can enable the display of battery level; please be advised that this feature is still in a beta state and might not work on all devices all the time.
Configure buttons
  • edit a memory button (the stream url)
  • assign a label to a button (will be displayed instead of the number) - you can also do this by long clicking on a button; by long click you can also remove a button
  • enable up to 8 buttons (simply add the url of your favourite radio stream)
Stream Finder
  • you can search a radio stream using the dropdown boxes and the name text (the name does not need to be exact) and you can assign the radio to a memory. The app will even suggest a label ;)
  • please bear in mind that the list is not complete and might not be 100% accurate; if you have a radio that you want me to add in the list please send me an email
  • now the app will remember the last used country and language
Night Profile
  • you can define a different set of settings and activate them at a touch of a button (for instance you might set a bigger clock without seconds, or red color and brightness at 50% for the night while during the day it will be smaller, green, with seconds and brighter)
  • you can also define a start and end time for the \"night profile\". By doing so, the night settings will automatically be enforced at the specified time
Alarms

Pro tip: when alarm starts, touch the screen (or the check button) to cancel it without stopping radio;
when alarm plays, press the cancel button (marked with "x") to stop the alarm but not play the radio; next alarm will automatically be enabled.

  • you can set up to two alarms which will wake up the radio at the defined time. It will play the last played radio or a radio you choose from the settings. If the internet connection is down, it will play the default alarm sound.
  • you can set the recurring alarms on various days of the week (for example one on weekdays, one in weekend)
  • there is also a snooze function with 10 minutes snooze time; you can also set your own snooze time.
  • you can enable progressive sound: the radio will start playing at a low volume which will increase every 10 seconds. Please note that it will not increase the device volume (the one controlled by the volume buttons).
  • you can set a station to always start the alarm with

On Android 14 and above, you\'ll need to allow a special permission in order to use the alarm functionality.

*** WARNING: please do not use this app as your main alarm clock. Always use your usual alarm clock to wake you up. ***

I tried to keep it as simple as possible, but if you have any ideas or you think it can be improved, write me at my gmail address cristi.ciuc

The code is opensource and it can be found on github: https://github.com/ciuc/InternetRadioClock

"

"

First of all, thanks for downloading and using the Internet Radio Clock.

I\'ve created this app in my spare time, just for fun, but also trying to keep a good overall quality, and constantly improving it.

This app is and will always remain free and with no ads. All of its features will always be included with no in-app purchases.

If you like it, drink a beer for me. If you\'d also like me to drink a beer for you, rate 5 stars :)

Cheers!

"
